name: Shadow River Lord
description: The Shadow River Lord is a slender, shadowy figure that moves with an unnatural grace, capable of slipping through tight spaces effortlessly.
memorable: It can blind its foes and unleash a devastating geyser of shadowy water.
goals: To dominate foes with shadowy attacks and debilitate them with blindness.
relations: It may control lesser undead or shadow creatures in its domain.
environment: Typically found in haunted aquatic environments or dark, shadowy areas.
strengths: High dexterity and multiple combat abilities make it effective at both melee and ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant and force damage, common weaknesses for undead.
attacks: Uses the Greenfire Staff for melee strikes and the Shadowfrost Bolt for long-range attacks, causing a mix of bludgeoning, fire, necrotic, and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Geyser creates an area effect that deals significant necrotic and cold damage, potentially blinding enemies.
senses: It has darkvision allowing it to perceive its surroundings in total darkness effectively.
skills: Immunity to poison damage, exceptional resilience against various conditions shows its durability in combat.
additional_information: Amorphous form allows it to move through very narrow spaces without hindrance.
Resistance to cold, fire, and necrotic damage enhances its survivability in combat.
Can blind foes with successful coordinated attacks.
Immune to exhaustion and various status effects, maintaining combat effectiveness.
Highly agile, making it evasive in battle.
test_queries: shadow creature that swims and blinds enemies
undead lord with shadowy water attacks
agile undead that can glide through narrow spaces
creature that uses geysers of shadowy water
